title: Azaziah
html: AZAZIAH(Az·a·ziʹah) [Jehovah Has Proved Superior in Strength].1. One of six harpists in the procession that brought the ark of the covenant to Jerusalem.—1Ch 15:21.2. Father of Hoshea, the prince of the tribe of Ephraim in David’s time.—1Ch 27:16, 20, 22.3. A Levite, one of the ten commissioners appointed by King Hezekiah to bring in the contributions to Jehovah’s house.—2Ch 31:12, 13.
